comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- your title needs a little work -- "baseball" at end, and close brackets.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Wystan:  We apparently hit the character limit for the title that appears above the photo.  The complete title appears in the text block below the image.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Well, let's see, now . . . that certainly is a dilemma, but not an insuperable one. A conscientious proofreader would say that the title is prolix -- wordy, even -- and that unnecessary repetition could be ameliorated by excision of the phrase "New York" from the second iteration of "New York Giants" ("New York" being understood from the context). This will free up eight spaces at the end, which should be sufficient.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Good point :-)  And, one extra preposition also disappeared to add "(LOC)" at the end.
